title: Resolve a Promo Code Issue
description: A customer is trying to use a promo code online, but the website says it's invalid. They contact customer support.

tasks.description: Ask the customer for the promo code they are trying to use.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent gets the specific code.

tasks.description: Look up the promo code in the marketing system to check its terms and validity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent discovers the code was only valid for new customers, and this is a returning customer.

tasks.description: Explain the terms to the customer and, as a goodwill gesture, provide them with a different, valid promo code for a small discount.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent resolves the customer's frustration and provides a valid discount.
